Structs/MIDIPianoRollPosition.html#/s:17.name: beat
Structs/MIDIPianoRollPosition.html#/s:17.abstract: Beat number of a bar, between 0 and 4.

Structs/MIDIPianoRollPosition.html#/s:17.name: subbeat
Structs/MIDIPianoRollPosition.html#/s:17.abstract: Subbeat number of a beat, between 0 and 4.

Structs/MIDIPianoRollPosition.html#/s:17.name: cent
Structs/MIDIPianoRollPosition.html#/s:17.abstract: Cent value of a subbeat, between 0 and 240

Structs/MIDIPianoRollPosition.html#/s:17.name: isBarPosition
Structs/MIDIPianoRollPosition.html#/s:17.abstract: Returns true if beat, subbeat and cent is zero. The position is on the begining of a bar.

Structs/MIDIPianoRollPosition.html#/s:17.name: description
Structs/MIDIPianoRollPosition.html#/s:17.abstract: Returns piano roll beat text friendly string.

Structs/MIDIPianoRollNote.html.name: MIDIPianoRollNote
Structs/MIDIPianoRollNote.html.abstract: Data structure that represents a MIDI note in the piano roll grid.

Structs/MIDIPianoRollPosition.html.name: MIDIPianoRollPosition
Structs/MIDIPianoRollPosition.html.abstract: Represents the position on the piano roll by bar, beat, subbeat and cent values.

Protocols/MIDIPianoRollViewDelegate.html.name: midiPianoRollView(_:didMove:to:pitch:)
Protocols/MIDIPianoRollViewDelegate.html.abstract: Informs delegate about that the cell is moved a new position and/or row.

Protocols/MIDIPianoRollViewDelegate.html.name: midiPianoRollView(_:didResize:to:)
Protocols/MIDIPianoRollViewDelegate.html.abstract: Informs delegate about that the cell’s duration changed.

Protocols/MIDIPianoRollViewDelegate.html.name: midiPianoRollViewMultipleEditingDraggingView(_:)
Protocols/MIDIPianoRollViewDelegate.html.abstract: Gets custom dragging view from delegate. The view using for multiple selection visual cue.

Protocols/MIDIPianoRollCellViewDelegate..name: midiPianoRollCellViewDidMove(_:pan:)
Protocols/MIDIPianoRollCellViewDelegate..abstract: Informs about moving the cell with the pan gesture.

Protocols/MIDIPianoRollCellViewDelegate..name: midiPianoRollCellViewDidResize(_:pan:)
Protocols/MIDIPianoRollCellViewDelegate..abstract: Informs about resizing the cell with the pan gesture.

Protocols/MIDIPianoRollCellViewDelegate..name: midiPianoRollCellViewDidTap(_:)
Protocols/MIDIPianoRollCellViewDelegate..abstract: Informs about the cell has been tapped.

Protocols/MIDIPianoRollCellViewDelegate..name: midiPianoRollCellViewDidDelete(_:)
Protocols/MIDIPianoRollCellViewDelegate..abstract: Informs about the cell is about to delete.

Protocols/MIDIPianoRollCellViewDelegate..name: MIDIPianoRollCellViewDelegate
Protocols/MIDIPianoRollCellViewDelegate..abstract: Delegate functions to inform about editing or deleting cell.

Functions.html#/s:17MIDIPianoRollView1so.abstract: Substracts the right hand side position from left hand side position.

Functions.html#/s:17MIDIPianoRollView1lo.abstract: Compares if left hand side position is less than right hand side position.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/ZoomLevel.html.name: wholeNotes
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/ZoomLevel.html.abstract: A beat represent whole note. See one beat in a bar.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/ZoomLevel.html.name: halfNotes
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/ZoomLevel.html.abstract: A beat represent sixtyfourth note. See 2 beats in a bar.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/ZoomLevel.html.name: quarterNotes
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/ZoomLevel.html.abstract: A beat represent quarter note. See 4 beats in a bar.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/ZoomLevel.html.name: eighthNotes
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/ZoomLevel.html.abstract: A beat represent eighth note. See 8 beats in a bar.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/ZoomLevel.html.name: sixteenthNotes
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/ZoomLevel.html.abstract: A beat represent sixteenth note. See 16 beats in a bar.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/ZoomLevel.html.name: thirtysecondNotes
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/ZoomLevel.html.abstract: A beat represent thirtysecond note. See 32 beats in a bar.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/ZoomLevel.html.name: sixtyfourthNotes
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/ZoomLevel.html.abstract: A beat represent sixtyfourth note. See 64 beats in a bar.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/ZoomLevel.html.name: noteValue
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/ZoomLevel.html.abstract: Corresponding note value for the zoom level.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/ZoomLevel.html.name: renderingMeasureTexts
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/ZoomLevel.html.abstract: Rendering measure texts for note values in each zoom level.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/GridLines.html.name: rowVertical
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/GridLines.html.abstract: Vertical line between row keys and the grid.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/GridLines.html.name: measureText
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/GridLines.html.abstract: Beat text on the measure. Width property represents the font size.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/GridLines.html.name: half
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/GridLines.html.abstract: Vertical line for each half beat line.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/GridLines.html.name: quarter
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/GridLines.html.abstract: Vertical line for each quarter beat line.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/GridLines.html.name: eighth
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/GridLines.html.abstract: Vertical line for each eighth beat line.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/GridLines.html.name: sixteenth
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/GridLines.html.abstract: Vertical line for each sixteenth beat line.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/GridLines.html.name: thirtysecond
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/GridLines.html.abstract: Vertical line for each thirtysecond beat line.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/GridLines.html.name: sixtyfourth
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/GridLines.html.abstract: Vertical line for each sixthfourth beat line.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/GridLines.html.name: init(from:)
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/GridLines.html.abstract: Initilize the line with piano roll position. Useful for initilizing for measure lines.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/Bars.html#/s:1.name: auto
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/Bars.html#/s:1.abstract: Always a bar more than the last note’s bar.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/GridLines.html.name: GridLines
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/GridLines.html.abstract: All grid lines for line with and color customisation.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/ZoomLevel.html.name: ZoomLevel
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView/ZoomLevel.html.abstract: Zoom level of the piano roll that showing the mininum amount of beat.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: notes
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: All notes in the piano roll.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/timeSign.name: timeSignature
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/timeSign.abstract: Time signature of the piano roll. Defaults to 4/4.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: bars
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Bar count of the piano roll. Defaults to auto.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: keys
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Rendering note range of the piano roll. Defaults all MIDI notes, from 0 to 127.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: zoomLevel
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Current ZoomLevel of the piano roll.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: minZoomLevel
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Minimum amount of the zoom level.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: maxZoomLevel
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Maximum amount of the zoom level.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: zoomSpeed
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Speed of zooming by pinch gesture.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: maxBeatWidth
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Maximum width of a beat on the bar, max zoomed in.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: minBeatWidth
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Minimum width of a beat on the bar, max zoomed out.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: beatWidth
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Current with of a beat on the measure.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: measureHeight
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Fixed height of the bar on the top.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: rowWidth
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Fixed left hand side row width on the piano roll.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: rowHeight
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Current height of a row on the piano roll.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: maxRowHeight
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Maximum height of a row on the piano roll.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: minRowHeight
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Minimum height of a row on the piano roll.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: measureLabelConfig
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Label configuration for the measure beat labels.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: pianoRollDelegate
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Delegate that informs about cell changes.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: isEditing
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Enables/disables the edit mode. Defaults false.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: isZoomingEnabled
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Enables/disables the zooming feature. Defaults true.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: isMeasureEnabled
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Enables/disables the measure rendering. Defaults true.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: isMultipleEditing
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Enables/disables the multiple note cell editing at once. Defaults false.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: isAutoScrollingEnabled
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Enables/disables the auto scrolling on cell editing, when user hits the auto scrolling insets from an edge.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: autoScrollingInsets
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: When user edits a cell, if their finger inside from that inset, it start auto scrolling.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: autoScrollingTimeInterval
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Interval of the auto scrolling timer.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: autoScrollingSpeed
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Auto scrolling speed that happens in each autoScrollingTimeInterval.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: measureLayer
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Layer that measure drawn on. Top most layer.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/c:@M@MID.name: init(frame:)
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/c:@M@MID.abstract: Initilizes the piano roll with a frame.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/c:@M@MID.name: init(coder:)
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/c:@M@MID.abstract: Initilizes the piano roll with a coder.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.name: reload()
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html#/s:17MIDI.abstract: Removes each component and creates them again.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollRowView.html#/init(.name: init(pitch:)
Classes/MIDIPianoRollRowView.html#/init(.abstract: Initilizes the row with an assigned MIDI pitch.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollRowView.html#/c:@M@.name: init(coder:)
Classes/MIDIPianoRollRowView.html#/c:@M@.abstract: Initilizes the row from a coder with 0 pitch value.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollCellView.html#/s:17.name: resizingViewWidth
Classes/MIDIPianoRollCellView.html#/s:17.abstract: Inset from the rightmost side on the cell to capture resize gesture.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollCellView.html#/s:17.name: init(note:)
Classes/MIDIPianoRollCellView.html#/s:17.abstract: Initilizes the cell view with a note data.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollCellView.html#/c:@M.name: init(coder:)
Classes/MIDIPianoRollCellView.html#/c:@M.abstract: Initilizes the cell view with a decoder.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollMeasureLineLayer.ht.name: MIDIPianoRollMeasureLineLayer
Classes/MIDIPianoRollMeasureLineLayer.ht.abstract: Vertical line layer with measure beat text for each beat of the measure on the MIDIPianoRollView.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollRowView.html.name: MIDIPianoRollRowView
Classes/MIDIPianoRollRowView.html.abstract: Represents a MIDI note row of the MIDIPianoRollView.

Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html.name: MIDIPianoRollView
Classes/MIDIPianoRollView.html.abstract: Piano roll with customisable row count, row range, beat count and editable note cells.
